text: R4.6. Average Disk Access Time The average seek time for a disk is 17 ms. The disk rotates at 10000 RPM and there are 64 sectors per track. What is the average access time to read one sector, in ms? Give you answer to 2 decimal places. number (rtol=0.0001, atol=0.0051) (-] Save & Grade Single Save Additional attempts available with new Â° attempt (1% variants
